summary: OUR 2012 EXPEDITION SPEEDOMETER HAS REPEATEDLY DROPPED TO ZERO AND STOPPED FUNCTIONING WHILE DRIVING ON THE HIGHWAY.  WE BOUGHT THE TRUCK LAST MONTH AS A FORD CERTIFIED VEHICLE.  IT HAS 30K ORIGINAL MILES.  THIS IS A MAJOR SAFETY ISSUE.  WE HAVE ALSO SUBMITTED A COMPLAINT REGARDING INTERMITTENT LOSS OF TRANSMISSION OUTPUT.
